content: the gorgeous valyria shawl by johanna lindahl is made in the luxurious scheepjes whirligig the crocheted shawl is one of many designs published by scheepjes in their yarn - the after party booklets released with a new design every 2 weeks also available in print form scheepjes stockists yarn requirements * scheepjes scheepjes whirligig 20% alpaca 80% virgin wool 450g/1000m 214 sapphire to jade x 1 cake this crochet pattern is suitable for adventurous beginners and intermediate crocheters and contains a written pattern the pattern is available as a digital download in dutch german swedish french spanish and english uk and us terms the pattern is also available as a hardcopy booklet in dutch uk english swedish and german available from scheepjes retailers
